description: Detects disabling Windows Defender Tamper Protection
name: Disable Tamper Protection on Windows Defender
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Features\\TamperProtection* AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000000\)") AND (NOT ((process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND process.executable:*\\MsMpEng.exe) OR (process.executable:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Defender\\MsMpEng.exe"))))
author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
